functions.tag:
{pages:["# Golems can learn
# to perform a
# function, and love
# to help out.

func run(dist)
  print(dist)
  move(dist,0,0)
end

run(2)", "# They can also
# return the results
# of the function they
# perform.

func square(num)
  return num ** 2
end

let result = square(2)

print(result)"]}
